contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 29, 2013 D SCABA Autumn Contest (Second Section)
SCABA Autumn Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SCABA Autumn Contest scaba-autumn-contest-second-section
The Hawth, Crawley, West Sussex Best Instrumentalist: Gillian Park (cornet), Regent Best Horn section: Shanklin Best Solo Horn: Charlotte Lewis, Shanklin Best Percussion: Regent Conductor's Prize: Richard Baker, Hangleton Highest placed SCABA member band (Margaret Mortimer trophy): Hangleton.
Sept. 28, 2013, 1:52 p.m. Sept. 30, 2013, 10:35 a.m.
1 Hangleton Band Richard Baker Arkansas
2 Cold Ash Brass Jemma Johnstone The Dark Side of the Moon
3 Regent Community Brass Alan Duguid Penlee
4 Shanklin Town Brass Malcolm Lewis Olympus
5 Snowdown Colliery Welfare Band Christer Aberg Legend in Brass
6 Crystal Palace Band Michael Gray Henry the Fifth [Vaughan Williams]
7 Medway Concert Brass John Campbell Kaleidoscope [Sparke]
Withdrawn Wantage Concert Brass Danny Dullforce
